items.content_html:
I miss likes/favourites/whatevers

I know Micro.blog purposely doesn’t have “likes” but I miss them. Not because I want to be silently praised by internet peeps, but because I want to give likes. I see them as a kind of silent feedback. Like if you’re in a pub talking and someone gives a knowing nod, or a smile.

I want to be able to give the virtual equivalent of that silent nod. That passive appreciation for what I just read.

Likes are silent communication and I miss them. Not everything requires a reply…
items.content_text:

I want to be able to give the virtual equivalent of that silent nod. That passive appreciation for what I just read.

Likes are silent communication and I miss them. Not everything requires a reply…
